lyrics:
26 contributorsloved you first lyricsverse 1 zayn liam
girl that should be me driving to your house
knockin on your door and kissing you on the mouth
holdin on your hand dancin in the dark
cause i was the only one who loved you from the start

prechorus harry
but now when i see you with him
it tears my world apart because

chorus all harry
ive been waitin all this time to finally say it
but now i see your hearts been taken
and nothing could be worse baby i loved you first
had my chances coulda been where he is standin
thats what hurts the most girl i came so close
but now youll never know baby i loved you first

verse 2 louis harry
girl it should be me callin on your phone
saying youre the one and that ill never let you go
i never understood what love was really like
but i felt it for the first time lookin in your eyes

prechorus liam
but now when i see you with him
my whole world falls apart because
you might also likechorus all harry
ive been waitin all this time to finally say it
but now i see your hearts been taken
and nothing could be worse baby i loved you first
had my chances coulda been where he is standin
thats what hurts the most girl i came so close
but now youll never know baby i loved you first

bridge zayn
first touch the first kiss
first girl who made me feel like this
heartbreak its killing me
i loved you first why cant you see

breakdown niall zayn
ive been waitin all this time to finally say it
but now i see your hearts been taken
and nothing could be worse baby i loved you first

chorus all zayn harry  zayn
had my chances coulda been where he is standin coulda been where he is
thats what hurts the most girl i came so close
but now youll never know baby i loved you first

outro zayn zayn  harry
baby i loved you first
baby i loved you first oh yeah
baby i loved you first15embed
